about.title: About Us
about.description1: Since 1980, Il Sorpasso has been the reference point for vintage car rental in the Italian and international film industry.
about.description2: Our passion for historic cars and deep knowledge of the film industry have allowed us to build one of the largest collections of vintage vehicles in Europe.
about.description3: We collaborate with the most important production houses, guaranteeing not only the means but also historical consulting and technical support for any type of project.

vintage.title: VINTAGE CARS
vintage.subtitle: From 1900 to today
vintage.longDescription: Our collection of vintage cars spans from 1900 to today, offering a wide range of vehicles for every cinematic need.

moto.description: Historic and modern motorcycles for every need
moto.longDescription: Our motorcycle collection ranges from the most iconic vintage bikes to modern two-wheelers, including the timeless Vespas and Lambrettas, perfect for any production.
